entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as one of the people muttering behind Harry's back.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as someone who was in a break-up with Ginny.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is mentioned as someone who has returned to the team.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being the life and soul of the team and making her teammates laugh with her imitations.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who was anxiously bobbing up and down in front of the goalposts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the captain of the Quidditch team and receiving Bludger injuries during practice.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: McLaggen is mentioned as someone who was previously on the team but has been removed.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as someone who had a relationship with Ron in the past.

relationships.description: Harry has romantic feelings for Ginny, as indicated by his inner conflict between choosing her and Ron.
Ron had a past relationship with Lavender.
Harry and McLaggen have a conflict, as indicated by Harry being knocked out cold by McLaggen during practice.
Ginny was in a break-up with Dean.
Harry also has romantic feelings for Ron, as indicated by his inner conflict between choosing Ginny and Ron.
